headline: 1 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stock Down 30%: 4 Reasons to Buy Public Storage in 2025 and Hold Forever
summary: Between 2020 and 2022, leading self-storage real estate investment trust (REIT) Public Storage (NYSE: PSA) saw its share price more than double thanks to a pandemic-aided boom.  Since then, however, Public Storage's stock has dropped roughly 30% from its highs.  To be fair to Public Storage, nothing business-specific went wrong operationally.
